name: DODGING BUILDING
description:
With the rapid development of tourism industry, the native environment of cultural relics is being squeezed constantly. Meanwhile, under the economic interests, cultural relic’s protection and heritage tourism contradictions continue to intensify, while the conservation and delivery of the culture needs to keep a balance between them.

To help preserve the Humble Administer's gardens, a new approach of tourists guide should be sought. I design a game which is aimed to help preserve the Classical Gardens of Suzhou, utilizing the mobile technology for reaching a broader audience, and create a type of interactive studying experience that is not only pleasurable, but also educational for users, so people could realized the values of the cultural heritage and learn how to protect them.
